name: Lucifer
ability: Slightly reduces the DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a demon known for controlling Hell. He's a pop star famous all the way from the highest reaches of Heaven to the lowest corners of Hell. He was banished from Heaven for his pride, but since then he's learned to appreciate other people more—proof that he's making progress in life. Together with his new rival, he will surely set his sights higher and endeavor to achieve even greater things.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Spirit Idol Competition" Event: Clear Chapter 5
◦ "Spirit Idol Competition" Event: Exchange for 5000 Voting Slip
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Voting Slip during the "Spirit Idol Competition" event.

main: "When it comes to my music, prepare yourself for the very best!"
limit_break: "I'm gonna soar to even greater heights!"
